heading: HB00541
0: AN ACT REQUIRING HEALTHCARE FACILITIES TO PROVIDE A PRICE LIST OF ITS HEALTHCARE SERVICES INCLUDING INCIDENTAL EXPENSES AND MEDICAL SUPPLIES THAT CAN BE CHARGED IN THE MEDICAL BILL
short-title: Healthcare Services Price Disclosure Act Of 2016.
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2016-07-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00541
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REQUIRING HEALTHCARE FACILITIES TO PROVIDE A PRICE LIST OF ITS HEALTHCARE SERVICES INCLUDING INCIDENTAL EXPENSES AND MEDICAL SUPPLIES THAT CAN BE CHARGED IN THE MEDICAL BILL
SHORT TITLE : Healthcare Services Price Disclosure Act Of 2016.
ABSTRACT : States that learning the price in advance enables the public to make informed judgement of the cost they would spend upon admission of the patients.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : YAP, VICTOR A.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Panotes (039 2016-10-19)2. Espino (047 2016-11-22)
3. Primicias-Agabas (060 2017-01-23)4. Fortun (000 2018-09-20)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH ON 2016-07-27
